game

Interface ZombieWorld

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ActorInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Actor, Bug, Farmer, Human, Player, Player, Player, Zombie, ZombieActor

    public interface ZombieWorld
    An Actor of the ZombieWorld game implements these interfaces to determine the type of Zombie Actor, whether an Actor that has limbs can have its limbs knocked off and determine whether it is able to revive itself after being killed.
    Author:
    Isaac Lee Kian Min

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default boolean ableToRevive()
      In the ZombieWorld, a ZombieActor is unable to revive after being killed, unless...
      java.lang.Enum<?> getTypeOfZombieActor()
      Get this Type of Zombie Actor in the Zombie World.
      default java.lang.String knockOffLimb(GameMap map)
      An Actor in the ZombieWorld can have its limbs knocked off if it has limbs.

    • Method Detail

      • getTypeOfZombieActor

        java.lang.Enum<?> getTypeOfZombieActor()
        Get this Type of Zombie Actor in the Zombie World. Implement this method to get the types of Zombie Actor in the Zombie World.
        Returns:
        type of Zombie Actor.

      • knockOffLimb

        default java.lang.String knockOffLimb(GameMap map)
        An Actor in the ZombieWorld can have its limbs knocked off if it has limbs. Override this method to determine how an Actor that has limbs may have its limbs knocked off it.
        Parameters:
        map - the map where the current Zombie Actor is.
        Returns:
        a default value of null.

      • ableToRevive

        default boolean ableToRevive()
        In the ZombieWorld, a ZombieActor is unable to revive after being killed, unless... Override this method to determine whether a Zombie Actor can revive.
        Returns:
        a default value of false.
